description: This file defines a mock class DisplayMock for unit testing, which inherits from device::DisplayImpl and uses Google Mock to mock various methods related to display settings and state.

classes.name: DisplayMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing device::DisplayImpl for testing purposes, allowing control and verification of display-related behavior.

methods.name: getEDIDBytes
methods.description: Mocks the method to retrieve EDID bytes.

methods.name: isConnectedDeviceRepeater
methods.description: Mocks the method to check if the connected device is a repeater.

methods.name: getSurroundMode
methods.description: Mocks the method to get the surround sound mode.

methods.name: setAllmEnabled
methods.description: Mocks the method to enable or disable ALLM (Auto Low Latency Mode).

methods.name: setAVIContentType
methods.description: Mocks the method to set the AVI content type.

methods.name: setAVIScanInformation
methods.description: Mocks the method to set AVI scan information.
